basic.description: Abstractions and patterns of interactions and relationships among modules. Design recovery; relationship of architecture to requirements and testing.
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Software Architecture

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQ: ELEC 270 and CMPE 223 or CISC 223 and ELEC 276 or ELEC 278 and registered in BSCE.
EXCLUSION: CISC 323 or CMPE 323
